article_title: 7 Key Takeaways From CNN's GOP Presidential Debate

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Last night, CNN and the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library hosted the second set of Republican presidential debates of the 2016 election cycle. While most of the coverage will focus on who did the best, the more significant takeaway from the debate is the number of candidates who will lose even more momentum.
